name: Fetch & manage Microsoft Defender alerts
description:
A beginner Story that fetches Microsoft Defender alerts and creates a Jira ticket for each of them.

tags: Microsoft, Beginner, Jira, Alert
icons: Microsoft, ðŸš¨, Jira
visibility: public

payload.jira_body:
h2. Alert Overview:

||*Alert Link*| https://security.microsoft.com/alerts/<<explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.id>> |
||*Priority*|<<explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.severity>> |
||*Title*|<<explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.title>> |
||*Detection Source*|<<explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.detectionSource>> |
||*Category*|<<explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.category>> |
||*Incident ID*|<<explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.incidentId>> |
||*Description*|<<explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.description>> |
||*Alert creation time*|<<explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.alertCreationTime>> |
||*First Event*|<<explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.firstEventTime>> |
||*Last Event*|<<explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.lastEventTime>> |
||*Machine ID*|<<explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.machineId>> |
||*Computer DNS Name*|<<explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.computerDnsName>> |

h2. Alert Evidence
<%for evidence in explode_individual_detections.individual_detection.evidence%>
*Evidence <<FORLOOP.index>> of <<FORLOOP.length>>*

||*Description*|<<DEFAULT(evidence.entityType, "N/A")>> |
||*Evidence Creation Time*|<<DEFAULT(evidence.evidenceCreationTime, "N/A")>> |
<%if evidence.sha1 != NULL%>||*SHA1*|<<evidence.sha1>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.sha265 != NULL%>||*SHA256*|<<evidence.sha256>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.filename != NULL%>||*File Name*|<<evidence.fileName>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.filepath != NULL%>||*File Path*|<<evidence.filePath>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.processid != NULL%>||*Process ID*|<<evidence.processId>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.processCommandLine != NULL%>||*Process Command Line*|<<evidence.processCommandLine>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.processCreationTime != NULL%>||*Process Creation Time*|<<evidence.processCreationTime>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.parentprocessId != NULL%>||*Parent Process ID*|<<evidence.parentprocessId>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.parentProcessCreationTime != NULL%>||*Parent Process Creation Time*|<<evidence.parentProcessCreationTime>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.ParentProcessFileName != NULL%>||*Parent File Name*|<<evidence.parentProcessFileName>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.parentProcessFilePath != NULL%>||*Parent File Path*|<<evidence.parentProcessFilePath>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.ipAddress != NULL%>||*IP Address*|<<evidence.ipAddress>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.url != NULL%>||*URL*|<<evidence.url>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.registryKey != NULL%>||*Registry Key*|<<evidence.registryKey>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.registryhive != NULL%>||*Registry Hive*|<<evidence.registryHive>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.registryValueType != NULL%>||*Registry Value Type*|<<evidence.registryValueType>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.registryValue != NULL%>||*Registry Value*|<<evidence.registryValue>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.accountName != NULL%>||*Account Name*|<<evidence.accountName>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.domainName != NULL%>||*Domain Name*|<<evidence.domainName>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.userSid != NULL%>||*User SID*|<<evidence.userSid>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.aadUserId != NULL%>||*AA AD User ID*|<<evidence.aadUserId>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.userPrincipalName != NULL%>||*User Principal Name*|<<evidence.userPrincipalName>> |
<%endif%><%if evidence.detectionStatus != NULL%>||*Detection Status*|<<evidence.detectionStatus>> |<%endif%>
<%endfor%>

diagram_notes.content:
https://image-uploads.tines.com/framed-logo-ms-defender.png

# **Microsoft Defender Detections**

This is a simple story to Extract New Microsoft Defender alerts and create a ticket in Jira for each of them.



# Requirements
- [ ] A Microsoft Defender OAuth Token
- [ ] A Jira API Key and Username
